segments.text: I'm watching a kitchen scene unfold before me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a bright day, light streaming through the window.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman at the sink is diligently drying a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her focus is entirely on that one task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But oh my, the sink is absolutely overflowing!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is sheeting down the cabinet doors, pooling on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One of her feet is actually standing right in it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she not feel that cold water?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm genuinely worried she's going to slip.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The amount of water damage this will cause is immense.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation is a silent disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR
